original_title: Gennady Golovkin vs. Canelo Alvarez II
overview: After their first fight ended in a controversial split decision draw, Canelo Alvarez and Gennady Golovkin meet for a second time with the WBA Super Middleweight and WBC and IBO Middleweight Titles on the line.  T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada on September 15, 2018.
title: Gennady Golovkin vs. Canelo Alvarez II
